EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_ANZ_CF_Meetup_Q215.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Cloud Foundry Meetup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
You're invited to the new Cloud Foundry Community Meetup <http://www.meetup.com/Sydney-Cloud-Foundry-Meetup/> in Sydney.
We will talk about all things Cloud Foundry. Whether that's about buildpacks, service brokers, microservices, BOSH, high availability, Docker and container orchestration, Diego, Lattice, multi data centre design, continuous delivery or cloud native application design. We got you covered.
Join <http://www.meetup.com/Sydney-Cloud-Foundry-Meetup/> to learn more, including meeting times and locations.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
